This version includes an app rename. Please update manually:

  1. Quit "Project PA" completely
  2. Open the downloaded DMG
  3. Drag "DdukMemo" to Applications (replace if asked)
  4. Delete old "Project PA.app" from Applications

Your data is safe - it's stored in ~/Library, not inside the app.
